node.display_long_description:
Drive, Shoot & Drift like NEVER before.

Key features:
Cross Buy for Rift & Quest
Enhanced Graphics for Quest 2 & 90hz
Over 11 unique tracks and growing
Race up to 8 friends
Offline Story mode
Over 100 hours of Gameplay, Quests & Achievements
All original & unique tracks
Cross-platform play
Cloud save
Regular online tournaments

Extras:
Motion sickness prevention options
Onboarding class for new VR racer
Game for everyone with Casual & Hardcore racing modes
Social with meme, stickers, voice chat & dance moves
Customize every detail from your outfit down to the rim of your car

Coming soon:
More Weapons
More online Tournaments

Dash Dash World is a cross-platform VR kart racing game equipped with immersive full-hand driving and weapon controls. Lose yourself in hundreds of hours of gameplay. Including a fascinating story mode, exhilarating online tournaments, more than a trillion customization combinations, and hundreds of achievements for the trophy hunters out there!

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
[Feature]
- Seasonal Event Crystal bits X 2
- Reposition AI in License 2 weapons training
- Indicator to show selected map options in the Lobby
- Reduce duration of "The One"

[Bug fix]
- Fix Achievements that cannot be claimed or unlocked.
  How ever, please do note that all Achievements regarding NPCs such as Yoon, Big Bill are not yet fixed and will be fixed in our later update. 
- Crash after completing a Grand Prix match.
- Crash when starting License 1 in loading screen.
- Crash in License 2 when using Face Blaster.
- Immersive mode : Hand can get stuck when holding the steering wheel through the Lobby.
- Pressing drift while not changing direction still activates drift.
- Player profiles on the scoreboard are blinking after race ends.
- Matchmaking can't find AIs when selecting Prefer Player in options.
- Onsen Shima: When AIs drive to the flying area, it‚Äôs gliders will always get stuck.
- Academy: Face Blaster, Angry Bow, and Gauntlet progression doesn‚Äôt count.
- When disconnecting and reconnecting, the non-primary Virtual hand doesn't grab the steering wheel.
- License 3 is missing a finish line on the ground.
- Can still get Extreme tracks when not selecting Extreme options.
- Race Again button is missing when reconnecting to the game in the final Reward scene.
- Can reverse fly in Track 5 Volcanic Jungle.
- Sliding Boost pads are disappearing in track 1 Monte Alpaca at water zones.
- Region options menu is overlapping other menus when switching pages in the garage.
- Academy condition "Overrun" will not show as failed when race ends.
- When a match is found during a loading scene, it will cause an error.

nodes.title: Unlock all of the Seasonal Exclusive Items in Circuit Wonder Tournament today!
nodes.body_text:
Challenge yourself during this winter in FROSTY SEASON ‚òÉÔ∏è‚ùÑÔ∏è

Complete 30 new challenges throughout this season with 3 competitive events. üèéüí¶

Your chance to unlock all-new 26 limited exclusive items during this season ONLY!



Full Throttle (LIVE NOW)



Become a Drift King in Dash Dash and show that you own the race by completing 10 new challenging drifting quests.

Jump in the Full Throttle event from 28th ( 00.00 am PDT) January - 10th (11.59 pm PDT) February 2021

Here are 10 new challenging quests to complete üòé

- Victory Hunting I/II/III/IV - Sustain the drift for at least 4/5/6/7 seconds.
- Drift Maniac I/II/III - Fill the Nitro gauge with a single drift 40/80/120 times.
- Initial Dash Dash - Collect 200 secs or more drift time in any mode.
- Initial Dash Rush - Collect 50 secs or more drift time in single race mode.
- Initial Dash GP - Collect 150 secs or more drift time in any mode.
- Secret Dasher I - Collect 555 secs or more drift time in any mode.
- Secret Dasher II - Sustain the drift for at least 9 secs

Circuit Wonder



Race in 6 wonderful circuits with 10 new quests and meet Dash Dash Academy members during the Circuits Wonder event. üèé  üó∫

Who knows you might face some Top Racers from Dash Dash Academy. So watch out cause they won‚Äôt go easy on you!

Circuits Wonder event starting TODAY until 27 January 2021

Here are 10 new challenging quests to complete:

- Victory Hunting I/II/III/IV -  Tier 90%/70%/30%/10% on Seasonal Leaderboard.
- Alpaca Brawl - Beat Special Character in Monte Alpaca 2 times.
- Mad Liberty - Beat Special Character in Liberty Circuit 5 times.
- Kabo Dojo Havoc - Beat Special Character in Kabo Dojo 2 times.
- The Witness Meddy - Beat Special Character in Ideon Grotto 2 times.
- Mariachi Smash Down - Beat Special Character in Los Muertos 5 times.
- Evopolis Era - Best Special Character in Evopolis 5 times.

Immersive Festa (Ended)



Now it‚Äôs your chance to improve your immersive driving skills with new 10 immersive quests to complete.  üí™

Immersive Festa event starts TODAY until  12th January 2021 (11.59 pm PDT)

Here are 10 new challenging quests to complete:

- Victory Hunting I/II/III/IV - Top 90/70/30/10% on Seasonal Leaderboard.
- The Showdown - Win 3 race while playing using the Immersive control.
- Triple Xtreme -  Place top 3 in extreme track while using super immersive control 3 times (any track)
- Nitro Dash - Nitro 10 times in a single race while using super immersive control.
- The Survivor - Wipe egg, dino carbo, and carbo cracker off-screen while using super immersive control.
- Dash Store - Consume all Dash Products in a single race while using super immersive control (Bar, Bull, and Max).
- Shoot and Drive - Hit 3 racers with a single Terminator Jr. while using super immersive control.



View the Tournament trailer on Youtube here. And as always, there is a Redeem code hidden in our video ;)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UWcdmi6XzoI

nodes.title: Virtual Steering in VR is here!
nodes.body_text:

node.reviewDescription: This is game is outstanding I love to play with my loving and adoring kids. You feel like an absolute gangster when you gun down ur enemies with an oozie, please buy this game as it made my life whole again, you see my wife left me and took the kids and we secretly play this together online so it glad to show my support.
node.reviewTitle: Omg this game touched me in places

website_page_meta.description:
Dash Dash is a cross-platform VR racing game with full hand driving and weapons controls.

Over 100 hours of gameplay contents including story mode, regular online tournaments, 100s of achievements and over 1,000,000,000,000 customizable parts.
